classes.name: tree-menu
classes.description: Wrapping element for the tree menu component

classes.name: tree-menu__item--no-children
classes.description: Tree menu items with no children

classes.name: tree-menu__icon
classes.description: Basic collapse/expand icon display for menu items

classes.name: tree-menu__icon--inline
classes.description: Inline icon display for menu items

classes.name: tree-menu__block
classes.description: The containing unordered list around the tree menu items

classes.name: tree-menu__subgroup
classes.description: Wrapping element for a nested list

description:
A tree menu presents a hierarchical list. Any item in the hierarchy may have
child items, and items that have children may be expanded or collapsed to show
or hide the children.
name: Tree - Styles
usage:
A tree menu presents a hierarchical list. Any item in the hierarchy may have child items, and items that have children may be expanded or collapsed to show or hide the children. - Set and `aria-labelledby` attribute on the outermost parent to connect with the ID value of a label for the tree menu. - The tree menu container must have a `role=tree` attribute. - Each parent node contains or owns an element with a `role="group"` attribute. - Each element serving as a tree node must have a `role="treeitem"` attribute. - Each level of the tree menu that has child element must set an `aria-setsize` attribute. This attribute defines the number of items in the current set of listitems or treeitems. - Each level of the tree menu that has child element must set an `aria-posinset` attribute. This attribute defines an element's number or position in the current set of listitems or treeitems. - Each parent container must have an `aria-expanded` attribute to communicate the state of the child menu. It takes one of two values: `true` or `false`. true means a section that this element denotes is currently expanded (visible), false means the expandable section or items is/are currently collapsed (invisible). - Setting a `tabindex="0"` to the element you need to click will ensure that the component is also keyboard accessible. ```html

Tree Menu Label

  • Parent Item
    • Child Menu Item
    • Child Menu Item
  • Parent Menu Item
```
